sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_snc_nnemc0_hardware_categories"> <x_snc_nnemc0_hardware_categories action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>Stands for "Uninterruptible Power Supply." It is a type of power supply that uses battery backup to maintain power during unexpected power outages. A typical UPS is a rack mountable unit with separate batteries similar to car batteries. This category does not include UPS for portable and desktop computers.</description> <material_category>UPS</material_category> <number>HWCAT0001016</number> <sys_class_name>x_snc_nnemc0_hardware_categories</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>jnyika</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-01 19:05:26</sys_created_on> <sys_id>df69ce0b13bca380f60ebccf3244b0cf</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jnyika</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-01 19:05:26</sys_updated_on> </x_snc_nnemc0_hardware_categories> </record_update>
